subsections.subtitle: VPN Connectivity
subsections.content: We provide VPN services using protocols like VMess, VLESS, Reality, and Hysteria via Sing-Box. Features include server selection, split tunneling (user-defined IP lists for inclusive/exclusive routing), kill switch (always enabled), and Guardian (optional blocking of social media, adult content, gambling sites using public GitHub lists).

subsections.subtitle: Geo-Optimization
subsections.content: To provide high-quality, location-appropriate services, we optimize API endpoints and VPN server lists based on your device's timezone (automatically detected from device settings, not stored on servers) and IP address location (queried real-time during splash screen on app launch). For example, users in the UK may receive UK-based API domains and a tailored list of 10 servers, while users in Germany may get Germany-based APIs and 15 servers from different countries. This ensures better speed, stability, and relevance without storing location data. All users receive fair and optimal services based on their detected location.
